texts: What, someone from the capital came? I thought you forgot abot your damn duties.
Look, I'm sorry for what I've said earlier. Just get this thing over with and you can move on with your life.
Oh, nothing, it's just that we requestsed aid from the capital god knows how long ago.
Our crop fields have been overrun with these weird *things* and no one's brave enough to shoo them away.That's where you come in. Just clear the fields...please.
Thank god. You're a life saver. I know this was just another chore for you, but I really wanted to say I appreciate what you've done for us. Also, here's your reward. Farewell!
Hey, it's you again. How's it going, hero?

answers.text: So what do you want me to do?
How about I came back later when you dropped the attitude?
So what do you want me to do?
Next time, try with 'please' and 'thank you'.
I don't see how that's my fault though.
